actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Raymond W. Milling.

summary.text: Declares that a specified period of employment shall be included in the years of creditable service of a named individual in determining eligibility for and the amount of civil service retirement annuity benefits, if such individual makes a specified deposit. Requires that, if credit is given for such period, no credit for such period shall be allowed for old age, survivors and disability insurance benefits computation or coverage determination purposes.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Raymond W. Milling.
